H0.text: Very high melting point is a characteristic physical property of all elements in the group located in the rightmost column of the periodic table.

H1.text: Gas state at room temperature is the characteristic physical property of all elements in the group located in the rightmost column of the periodic table.

H2.text: Good conductor of electric current is a physical property characteristic of all elements in the rightmost column of the periodic table.

H3.text: Extremely brittle solid at room temperature is the physical property characteristic of all elements in the group located in the rightmost column of the periodic table.

A4.text: Under standard conditions, the first six of these elements are odorless, colorless, monatomic gases.

A5.text: The noble gases have weak interatomic force, and consequently have very low melting and boiling points.
